title: Fever of Unknown Origin
description: Medical consultation dialogue focusing on taking history from a patient with fever of unknown origin, including symptoms assessment and diagnostic questioning

conversation.teacherApp: Say "Ready to practice" to begin your medical English session!
conversation.expectedResponse: Ready to practice

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about duration: І як довго... як довго у вас така температура?
conversation.expectedResponse: And how long... how long have you had this temperature?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Perfect - Duration question with 'how long'

conversation.teacherApp: Patient responds uncertainly: О,я не знаю точно.
conversation.expectedResponse: Oh, I do not know exactly.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient estimates: Приблизно два місяці з перервами (то є, то némає)
conversation.expectedResponse: About two months on and off.

conversation.teacherApp: You clarify: І чи температура у вас весь час?
conversation.expectedResponse: And do you have a temperature all the time?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Simple - Yes/No question with frequency

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about timing: Чи вона з'являється в якийсь певний час?
conversation.expectedResponse: Or does it come on at any particular time?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Simple - Question about timing patterns

conversation.teacherApp: Patient explains daytime feeling: Ну, іноді я почуваюся нормально протягом дня.
conversation.expectedResponse: Well, sometimes I feel all right during the day.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient describes night symptoms: Але я прокидаюся вночі і весь мокрий від поту.
conversation.expectedResponse: But I wake up at night and I am drenched in sweat.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient adds more symptoms: І іноді все моє тіло трясеться і...
conversation.expectedResponse: And sometimes my whole body shakes and...

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about general wellbeing: І як ви почувалися загалом?
conversation.expectedResponse: And how have you been feeling in general?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Perfect Continuous - General state inquiry

conversation.teacherApp: Patient hesitates to respond: Ну, я не знаю.
conversation.expectedResponse: Well, I do not know.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient admits: Я почувався трохи втомленим.
conversation.expectedResponse: I have been feeling a bit tired.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient describes weakness: Трохи втомленим і слабким.
conversation.expectedResponse: A bit tired and weak.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient explains lack of energy: І, здається, у мене просто немає енергії.
conversation.expectedResponse: And I just do not seem to have any energy.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about muscle pain: І чи помітили ви якийсь біль у м'язах?
conversation.expectedResponse: And have you noticed any, um, any pain in your muscles?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Perfect - Experience question with 'have you noticed'

conversation.teacherApp: Patient confirms with hesitation: Так, ну, насправді, трохи є, так.
conversation.expectedResponse: Yes, well, actually, I have a bit, yes.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about weight: А що з вашою вагою?
conversation.expectedResponse: And what about your weight?
conversation.grammarNote: Question phrase - 'What about' for topic transition

conversation.teacherApp: You check for weight loss: Ви схудли?
conversation.expectedResponse: Have you lost any weight?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Perfect - Yes/No question about recent change

conversation.teacherApp: Patient confirms significant loss: Так, так, я схуд, близько стоуна. («stone» означає певну одиницю ваги, еквівалентну 14 фунтам або 6,35 кілограмам)
conversation.expectedResponse: Yes, yes, I have, about a stone.

conversation.teacherApp: You acknowledge and continue: Розумію, і, ем, а що з вашим апетитом?
conversation.expectedResponse: I see, and, um, what about your appetite?

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about eating habits: Яким був ваш апетит?
conversation.expectedResponse: What has your appetite been like?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Perfect - 'What has... been like' for recent state

conversation.teacherApp: Patient describes poor appetite: Ну, останнім часом я дійсно не їв.
conversation.expectedResponse: Well, I have not really been eating lately.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient explains lack of interest: Я просто не відчував бажання їсти.
conversation.expectedResponse: I just have not felt like eating.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about cough: І чи був у вас кашель взагалі?
conversation.expectedResponse: And have you had a cough at all?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Perfect - Yes/No question with 'at all' for emphasis

conversation.teacherApp: Patient confirms with emphasis: О, так, був.
conversation.expectedResponse: Oh, yes, I have.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient describes frequency: Майже весь час.
conversation.expectedResponse: Nearly all the time.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient mentions sputum production: Іноді я відкашлюю багато мокротиння.
conversation.expectedResponse: I sometimes bring up a lot of phlegm.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about blood: І чи є... ви помітили кров у ньому?
conversation.expectedResponse: And is there... have you noticed any blood in it?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Perfect - Question about observed symptoms

conversation.teacherApp: Patient gives qualified answer: Ні, не завжди, але так, іноді.
conversation.expectedResponse: No, not always, but yes, sometimes.

conversation.teacherApp: You inquire about chest pain: Чи були у вас болі в грудях?
conversation.expectedResponse: Have you ever had chest pain?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Perfect - 'Have you ever' for lifetime experience

conversation.teacherApp: Patient specifies when pain occurs: Тільки якщо я роблю глибокий вдих.
conversation.expectedResponse: Only if I take a deep breath.

conversation.teacherApp: Well done, that is all for today's lesson, say "finish" to end the lesson.
conversation.expectedResponse: finish
